descriptions:
["DescriptionThis Type C 2 bedroom Spanish style townhouse in Arabian Ranches is now available for sale with Hamptons International.
- Type C
- 2 Bedroom
- Single row 
- The villa is very close to the pool and play area
- Very good for investors
- Rented for 120,000 till Feb 2020
- Back side of villa is open on Al Qudra road
- Well-maintained
Call Sabida Azharian Today +971502138026 / +97143661662. Toll-free: 800 Hamptons 80042678667) or email us on enquiries(at)Hamptons(dot)ae for further details. 
Each of the villas in Palmera is built with exceptional finishes, all bedrooms have built-in wardrobes, large balconies etc. External amenities include 24 hour security, 24 hour maintenance, community center with swimming pool and children's play area, JESS School and a lot more. 
Located on the western edge of Arabian Ranches, Palmera villas have exceptional finishes, including ceramic tiles throughout and decorative color palettes.
RERA #18118"]
